UniprotID	Q86YW0
Accession	Q86YW0;Q08AQ7;Q96J70
EntryName	PLCZ1_HUMAN
ProteinName	1-phosphatidylinositol 4,5-bisphosphate phosphodiesterase zeta-1 (EC 3.1.4.11) (Phosphoinositide phospholipase C-zeta-1) (Phospholipase C-zeta-1) (PLC-zeta-1) (Testis-development protein NYD-SP27)
GeneName	PLCZ1
Length	608
Function	The production of the second messenger molecules diacylglycerol (DAG) and inositol 1,4,5-trisphosphate (IP3) is mediated by activated phosphatidylinositol-specific phospholipase C enzymes. In vitro, hydrolyzes PtdIns(4,5)P2 in a Ca(2+)-dependent manner. Triggers intracellular Ca(2+) oscillations in oocytes solely during M phase and is involved in inducing oocyte activation and initiating embryonic development up to the blastocyst stage. Is therefore a strong candidate for the egg-activating soluble sperm factor that is transferred from the sperm into the egg cytoplasm following gamete membrane fusion. May exert an inhibitory effect on phospholipase-C-coupled processes that depend on calcium ions and protein kinase C, including CFTR trafficking and function.
Subcellular Location	Nucleus; Cytoplasm; Perinuclear region
Disorder	0.0258,0.0424,0.0662,0.0320,0.0443,0.0605,0.0780,0.0967,0.0662,0.0909,0.0605,0.0817,0.0749,0.0985,0.1048,0.1881,0.1969,0.1942,0.2064,0.2064,0.2002,0.2002,0.1275,0.1229,0.1643,0.1643,0.1048,0.0618,0.0662,0.0719,0.0646,0.1229,0.0704,0.0364,0.0341,0.0341,0.0380,0.0719,0.1229,0.0662,0.0646,0.1206,0.1162,0.1791,0.1162,0.1611,0.1028,0.1731,0.2609,0.1583,0.2224,0.1969,0.1251,0.1229,0.2064,0.1399,0.0835,0.0799,0.0765,0.0780,0.1424,0.1528,0.0948,0.0568,0.0631,0.0631,0.0306,0.0568,0.0543,0.0294,0.0581,0.0631,0.0835,0.1298,0.1969,0.1298,0.1275,0.1251,0.1007,0.0985,0.1070,0.0581,0.0433,0.0765,0.0631,0.0334,0.0581,0.1184,0.1184,0.1206,0.1184,0.1007,0.0749,0.0749,0.0592,0.0592,0.0967,0.1323,0.1349,0.1373,0.0734,0.0734,0.0765,0.0555,0.0555,0.1070,0.1092,0.1162,0.1275,0.0719,0.0749,0.1349,0.1092,0.1298,0.1184,0.1206,0.1206,0.1275,0.1206,0.1823,0.1323,0.2364,0.2224,0.1942,0.2783,0.2715,0.1914,0.2292,0.2258,0.1969,0.2783,0.2817,0.1823,0.1671,0.1048,0.0531,0.0646,0.0719,0.0765,0.0568,0.0581,0.0985,0.0592,0.0341,0.0719,0.0765,0.0581,0.1028,0.1275,0.1399,0.0851,0.0929,0.0888,0.0888,0.0765,0.0749,0.1449,0.1449,0.1323,0.1184,0.2002,0.2034,0.1323,0.1229,0.1399,0.1298,0.1323,0.1731,0.1092,0.0662,0.0555,0.1162,0.1048,0.1048,0.1092,0.1092,0.1759,0.1092,0.0765,0.0765,0.0646,0.0356,0.0235,0.0389,0.0676,0.0555,0.0568,0.0287,0.0174,0.0313,0.0300,0.0327,0.0163,0.0099,0.0097,0.0141,0.0214,0.0227,0.0424,0.0719,0.0870,0.0719,0.0817,0.0719,0.0749,0.0749,0.0799,0.0817,0.0929,0.1476,0.1323,0.2002,0.1323,0.1501,0.1528,0.1424,0.1424,0.1251,0.0749,0.0734,0.0555,0.0281,0.0405,0.0581,0.0581,0.0494,0.0248,0.0341,0.0341,0.0543,0.0555,0.0327,0.0414,0.0454,0.0494,0.0618,0.0631,0.0389,0.0605,0.1070,0.1028,0.0734,0.1162,0.1184,0.1028,0.1731,0.2064,0.3286,0.3019,0.2680,0.2399,0.2399,0.3392,0.2292,0.2951,0.3249,0.3983,0.2884,0.3599,0.3599,0.3426,0.2645,0.2680,0.2680,0.2752,0.2715,0.1881,0.1852,0.1759,0.1373,0.1914,0.2258,0.2193,0.1424,0.2399,0.2258,0.2884,0.3019,0.3840,0.3117,0.2988,0.1969,0.2715,0.2715,0.2
